summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing preservation, amending various sections of Chapter 22.210 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Ordinance 109220) to exempt certain housing units from the demolition fee requirement, authorizing the Director of the Department of Construction and Land Use to compute and publish the Housing Cost Index semi-annually, establishing the demolition license fee in the Metropolitan Business (BM) Zone, authorizing a replacement housing contract and bond, providing relocation assistance to certain tenants evicted prior to an owner's application for a demolition license, and establishing penalties for violations.
